Bash(git -C /Users/sb/Dev/chirostretch-wp commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add WooCommerce Bookings integration and headless auth improvements

- Add bookings-slots-api.php: REST API for booking availability slots with
  checkout validation bypass for headless bookings
- Add bookings-admin-enhancements.php: Bookings > Products submenu and
  auto-assign bookings category to booking products
- Add wpgraphql-woocommerce-bookings.php: GraphQL integration for bookings
- Add headless-password-reset.php: Rewrite password reset URLs in emails
  to use frontend URL \(fixes new account confirmation emails\)
- Add new-patient-coupon.php: New patient coupon functionality
- Update franchise-application-cpt.php: Various improvements

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/sb/Dev/chirostretch commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve WooCommerce Bookings integration and cart/checkout flow

- Update cart page to display booking date/time details and hide
  quantity controls for booking items
- Update CheckoutForm to conditionally show shipping section based
  on needs_shipping from cart API
- Add booking type and item_data fields to StoreCartItem type
- Improve BookingWidget with better slot selection and add-to-cart
- Add add-to-cart API route for bookings
- Remove unused /book page \(functionality moved to location pages\)
- Update bookings GraphQL queries
- Improve Gravity Forms lead webhook handling

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
